Mysterious Dye Merchant Roepina:
Hi traveler, passing by!
Maybe You are looking for samples of paints for tattoos? Well, I have them. But only one thing! When you purchase a tattoo you have a chance to receive one of nine tattoos randomly.
Depending on Your luck, You can get as regular paint, and are very rare and expensive. Horror what, huh?!
What? Would you like to try?
